# Element 2.0 WSDL ## Methods added: - updateRegion ## Methods signature changes: 1). Method addRegion: a). parameter structure changed on input Parameter [Region] has changed: Added attribute keys: Lat, Lon, Description 2). Method getRegion: a). parameter structure changed on output Added attribute keys: Lat, Lon, Description 3). Method getRegions: a). different parameter count on input Parameter [Language] was removed; was found at position 3.
